patthana8.2:1.1.pli: Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā …pe… dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā; paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca sahetukā khandhā. Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.2:2.1.pli: Naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana8.2:3.1.pli: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.2:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.

patthana8.2:6.1.pli: Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nasahetuko dhammo naahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa ca naahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana8.2:7.1.pli: Naahetuko dhammo naahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana8.2:8.1.pli: Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.2:9.1.pli: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare nava …pe… sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme …pe… jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate nava.

patthana8.20:1.1.pli: Nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano ca nanosaññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.20:2.1.pli: Nanosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano ca nanosaññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.20:3.1.pli: Nosaññojanañca nanosaññojanañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nosaññojanañca nanosaññojanañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nosaññojanañca nanosaññojanañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano ca nanosaññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.20:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana8.21:1.1.pli: Nasaññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojaniyo ca naasaññojaniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.21:2.1.pli: Naasaññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana8.21:3.1.pli: Nasaññojaniyañca naasaññojaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.21:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana8.22:1.1.pli: Nasaññojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.22:2.1.pli: Nasaññojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.22:3.1.pli: Nasaññojanasampayuttañca nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanasampayuttañca nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanasampayuttañca nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.22:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha …pe… adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana8.23:1.1.pli: Nasaññojanañceva naasaññojaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva naasaññojaniyo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanañceva naasaññojaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaññojaniyo ceva nanoasaññojano ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanañceva naasaññojaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva naasaññojaniyo ca naasaññojaniyo ceva nano ca saññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.23:2.1.pli: Naasaññojaniyañceva nano ca saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaññojaniyo ceva nano ca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana8.23:3.1.pli: Nasaññojanañceva naasaññojaniyañca naasaññojaniyañceva nanosaññojanañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva naasaññojaniyo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.23:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana8.24:1.1.pli: Nasaññojanañceva nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanañceva nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto ceva nanosaññojano ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanañceva nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto ceva nano ca saññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.24:2.1.pli: Nasaññojanavippayuttañceva nano ca saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto ceva nano ca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanavippayuttañceva nano ca saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanavippayuttañceva nano ca saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto ceva nano ca saññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.24:3.1.pli: Nasaññojanañceva nasaññojanavippayuttañca nasaññojanavippayuttañceva nano ca saññojanañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.25:1.1.pli: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ nasaññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto nasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saññojanavippayuttaṃ nasaññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto naasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saññojanavippayuttaṃ nasaññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto nasaññojaniyo ca saññojanavippayutto naasaññojaniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.25:2.1.pli: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ naasaññojaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto naasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana8.25:3.1.pli: Saññojanavippayuttaṃ nasaññojaniyañca saññojanavippayuttaṃ naasaññojaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojanavippayutto naasaññojaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.25:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana8.26:1.1.pli: Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho ca nanogantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.26:2.1.pli: Nanoganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanoganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanoganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho ca nanogantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.26:3.1.pli: Noganthañca nanoganthañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noganthañca nanoganthañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noganthañca nanoganthañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho ca nanogantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.26:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)

patthana8.27:1.1.pli: Naganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthaniyo ca naaganthaniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.27:2.1.pli: Naaganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana8.27:3.1.pli: Naganthaniyañca naaganthaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.27:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha pañca.)

patthana8.28:1.1.pli: Naganthasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthasampayutto ca naganthavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.28:2.1.pli: Naganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthasampayutto ca naganthavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.28:3.1.pli: Naganthasampayuttañca naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthasampayuttañca naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthasampayuttañca naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthasampayutto ca naganthavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.28:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana8.29:1.1.pli: Naganthañceva naaganthaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nagantho ceva naaganthaniyo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthañceva naaganthaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naaganthaniyo ceva nano ca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthañceva naaganthaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nagantho ceva naaganthaniyo ca naaganthaniyo ceva nano ca gantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.29:2.1.pli: Naaganthaniyañceva nano ca ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaganthaniyo ceva nanogantho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaganthaniyañceva nano ca ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nagantho ceva naaganthaniyo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaganthaniyañceva nano ca ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nagantho ceva naaganthaniyo ca naaganthaniyo ceva nano ca gantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.29:3.1.pli: Naganthañceva naaganthaniyañca naaganthaniyañceva nano ca ganthañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nagantho ceva naaganthaniyo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.29:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana8.3:1.1.pli: Nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.3:2.1.pli: Nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.3:3.1.pli: Nahetusampayuttañca nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.3:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana8.30:1.1.pli: Naganthañceva naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nagantho ceva naganthavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthañceva naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthavippayutto ceva nano ca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthañceva naganthavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nagantho ceva naganthavippayutto ca naganthavippayutto ceva nano ca gantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.30:2.1.pli: Naganthavippayuttañceva nano ca ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthavippayutto ceva nano ca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthavippayuttañceva nano ca ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nagantho ceva naganthavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthavippayuttañceva nano ca ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nagantho ceva naganthavippayutto ca naganthavippayutto ceva nano ca gantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.30:3.1.pli: Naganthañceva naganthavippayuttañca naganthavippayuttañceva nano ca ganthañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nagantho ceva naganthavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthañceva naganthavippayuttañca naganthavippayuttañceva nano ca ganthañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naganthavippayutto ceva nano ca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthañceva naganthavippayuttañca naganthavippayuttañceva nano ca ganthañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nagantho ceva naganthavippayutto ca naganthavippayutto ceva nano ca gantho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.31:1.1.pli: Ganthavippayuttaṃ naganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ganthavippayuttaṃ naganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ganthavippayuttaṃ naganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naganthaniyo ca ganthavippayutto naaganthaniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.31:2.1.pli: Ganthavippayuttaṃ naaganthaniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana8.31:3.1.pli: Ganthavippayuttaṃ naganthaniyañca ganthavippayuttaṃ naaganthaniyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.31:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana8.32:1.1.pli: Nooghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… noyogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Oghagocchakayogagocchakesu āmasanaṃ āsavagocchake āmasanasadisaṃ.)

patthana8.32:2.1.pli: Nonīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Nīvaraṇagocchake āmasanaṃ saññojanagocchake āmasanasadisaṃ.)

patthana8.33:1.1.pli: Noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.33:2.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana8.33:3.1.pli: Naparāmaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naparāmaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha pañca.)

patthana8.33:4.1.pli: Naparāmāsasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naparāmāsasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.33:5.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana8.33:6.1.pli: Naparāmāsañceva naaparāmaṭṭhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naparāmāso ceva naaparāmaṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naparāmāsañceva naaparāmaṭṭhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naaparāmaṭṭho ceva nano ca parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naparāmāsañceva naaparāmaṭṭhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naparāmāso ceva naaparāmaṭṭho ca naaparāmaṭṭho ceva nanoparāmāso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.33:7.1.pli: Naaparāmaṭṭhañceva nano ca parāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naparāmāso ceva naaparāmaṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana8.33:8.1.pli: Naparāmāsañceva naaparāmaṭṭhañca naaparāmaṭṭhañceva nano ca parāmāsañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naparāmāso ceva naaparāmaṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.33:9.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana8.33:10.1.pli: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ naparāmaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto naparāmaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ naparāmaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto naaparāmaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ naparāmaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto naparāmaṭṭho ca parāmāsavippayutto naaparāmaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.33:11.1.pli: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ naaparāmaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto naaparāmaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana8.33:12.1.pli: Parāmāsavippayuttaṃ naparāmaṭṭhañca parāmāsavippayuttaṃ naaparāmaṭṭhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāsavippayutto naaparāmaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana8.33:13.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe…. Avigate pañca.

patthana8.34:1.1.pli: Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo ca naanārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.34:2.1.pli: Naanārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo ca naanārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.34:3.1.pli: Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo ca naanārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.34:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana8.35:1.1.pli: Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacitto ca nanocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.35:2.1.pli: Nanocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana8.35:3.1.pli: Nacittañca nanocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.36:1.1.pli: Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko ca naacetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.36:2.1.pli: Naacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko ca naacetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.36:3.1.pli: Nacetasikañca naacetasikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacetasikañca naacetasikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nacetasikañca naacetasikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko ca naacetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.36:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana8.37:1.1.pli: Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṃ paṭicca cittasampayuttakā khandhā.

patthana8.37:2.1.pli: (Paccanīyadukamattāni na vattabbaṃ dhammaṃ pūretuṃ nava nava pañhāni karotu.)

patthana8.37:3.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.

patthana8.38:1.1.pli: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.39:1.1.pli: Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.39:2.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… adhipatiyā pañca …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.

patthana8.4:1.1.pli: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko ceva na nahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.4:2.1.pli: Naahetukañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko ceva na nahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naahetukañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naahetukañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.4:3.1.pli: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca naahetukañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.4:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava.

patthana8.40:1.1.pli: Nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.40:2.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.

patthana8.41:1.1.pli: Nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittānuparivatti dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.42:1.1.pli: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.43:1.1.pli: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.44:1.1.pli: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivatti dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.44:2.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana8.45:1.1.pli: Naajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana8.45:2.1.pli: Nabāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittaṃ paṭicca ajjhattikaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.45:3.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana8.46:1.1.pli: Naupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādā ca nanoupādā ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.46:2.1.pli: Nanoupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana8.46:3.1.pli: Naupādā ca nanoupādā ca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.46:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana8.47:1.1.pli: Naupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana8.47:2.1.pli: Naanupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno ca naanupādinno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.47:3.1.pli: Naupādinnañca naanupādinnañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.47:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana8.48:1.1.pli: Naupādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.48:2.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.

patthana8.49:1.1.pli: Nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso ca nanokileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.49:2.1.pli: Nanokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana8.49:3.1.pli: Nokilesañca nanokilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.49:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)

patthana8.5:1.1.pli: Nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva na nahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ceva na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.5:2.1.pli: Nahetuvippayuttañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva na nahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuvippayuttañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuvippayuttañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ceva na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.5:3.1.pli: Nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca nahetuvippayuttañceva na nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.50:1.1.pli: Nasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṅkilesiko ca naasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.50:2.1.pli: Naasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana8.50:3.1.pli: Nasaṅkilesikañca naasaṅkilesikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.50:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana8.51:1.1.pli: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana8.51:2.1.pli: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho ca naasaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana8.51:3.1.pli: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhañca naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana8.51:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
